name: I HAVE CANDY GET IN THE VAN
name_original: I HAVE CANDY GET IN THE VAN
description:
From the download page:

"It's time to go meet the kiddies! Drive around in your van, delighting all the children in the neighbourhood!

Take them back to your house for some secret activities.
Watch out for cops and adults! They don't seem to understand your 'hobby'."

Manual: http://sand-storm.net/img/game/[Indie%20games]/I%20HAVE%20CANDY%20GET%20IN%20THE%20VAN/readme.html
